admreg: Europe and Central Asia,Europe and Central Asia
subsc: Compulsory pension and unemployment insurance,Other social services,Central government administration
trustfund:
TF029817-KOSOVO-SOCIAL PROTECTION
            PROJECT - IBRD-FUNDED PORTION,TF028929-KOSOVO SOCIAL PROTECTION PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The project objectives of the Social
            Protection Project are to: 1) design a basic safety net for
            the immediate future; 2) design a sustainable social welfare
            system for the medium term; and 3) develop administrative
            capacity for delivery pf pensions, and veterans'
            (including disabled war veterans) benefits. There are four
            main components. The first component develops the social
            welfare structure by defining objectives and
            responsibilities of and interaction between public and
            private entities concerned with planning, management,
            administration, and delivery of social welfare services;
            drafting related regulatory acts, instructions, and
            guidelines; developing standards for accreditation and
            professional qualification; drafting job descriptions and
            determining skills requirements, staffing, and training
            needs. This component also strengthens policy analysis and
            administrative skills of the UN Interim Administration
            (UNMIK) Department of Health and Social Welfare (DHSW)
            staff; introduces strategic planning and policy development
            capacity; and develops an information and communications
            strategy aimed at welfare system workers and the general
            public. The second component upgrades the social welfare
            infrastructure. The third component builds the capacity of
            the Centers for Social Welfare (CSW). The fourth component
            strengthens essential servicesin the pension,
            veterans', and disabled war veterans' benefit administration.
